name: @apiteam/datapeak
description: Processes and analyse realtime metric data

scripts.install: cd src/datapeak-raw && wasm-pack build && rm pkg/package.json && cd .. && cd .. && rm -rf ./dist && mkdir -p dist/datapeak-raw/pkg && cp -r src/datapeak-raw/pkg dist/datapeak-raw && tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.build: cd src/datapeak-raw && wasm-pack build && rm pkg/package.json && cd .. && cd .. && rm -rf ./dist && mkdir -p dist/datapeak-raw/pkg && cp -r src/datapeak-raw/pkg dist/datapeak-raw && tsc -p tsconfig.json
